featured.text: Wang Chien-ming, the Yankees’ best pitcher last year, already showed his great _____ for baseball when he was still a teenager.

definition.zh_def: 美國職業棒球大聯盟的紐約洋基隊，成立於1901年，是最成功的棒球隊之一。
definition.en_def: The New York Yankees, a professional baseball team in Major League Baseball, established in 1901, known for being one of the most successful teams.
definition.example: The Yankees won their 27th World Series title in 2009.
